channel.title: TREKS & WALKS OF NORTHEASTERN INDIA on North by Northeast Journeys | Travels in Northeast India
channel.description: Recent content in TREKS & WALKS OF NORTHEASTERN INDIA on North by Northeast Journeys | Travels in Northeast India

item.title: MEGHALAYA: Walks in the clouds | Walking Holiday
item.description: Exploring the Abode of Clouds This Walking holiday takes you to beautiful Meghalaya, ‘The Abode of clouds’.

item.title: ARUNACHAL PRADESH (EAST): Walks in India's far east | Walking Holiday
item.description: Walks in India’s far east Arunachal Pradesh, ‘the dawn lit Mountains’ is the easternmost state of India.

item.title: ARUNACHAL PRADESH (WEST): The high lakes trek | Trekking Holiday
item.description: Trekking along the Bhutanese frontier This particular trek is set in Western Arunachal Pradesh, in the states Buddhist belt close to the tri-junction between India, Tibet and Bhutan.

item.title: SIKKIM: The Goecha la trek | Trekking Holiday
item.description: A Trek amongst the giants Sikkim is a mystical land of abundant natural beauty.
